Reference.database: Zabbix 1.8.x-2.2.x Local File Inclusion via XXE Attack

TestDescription.Description: Zabbix frontend supported an XML data import feature, where on the server it used DOMDocument to parse the XML. By default, DOMDocument also parses the external DTD, which could allow a remote attacker to use a crafted XML file causing Zabbix to read an arbitrary local file, and send the contents of the specified file to a remote server. [break][break] Affected versions: 1.8.19, 1.8.20, 2.0.9, 2.0.10, 2.0.11rc2, 2.0.11, 2.2.2, 2.2.3rc1, 2.2.3rc2, 2.2.3
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can read arbitrary local files from the affected server.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of Zabbix (this issue was fixed in version 2.3.2).
